column1: English Sent: A flat land of extensive alluvial deposits led to the formation of the northern plains of India.
Hindi Tansl: isa prakAra jaloDZa nikRepoM se nirmiwa eka viswqwa samawala BUBAga BArawa ke uwwarI_mExAna ke rUpa meM vikasiwa ho gayA.
Anu Translation:  viswqwa ElUvIala XaroharoM kI eka sapAta BUmi BArawa kI uwwarI samawala BUmi ke suvyavasWiwa krama ke lie kA_kAraNa huI
